text: Marco Mengoni (born 25 December 1988) is an Italian singer. He became famous in 2009 after winning the Italian version of The X Factor. In 2013, he won the Sanremo Music Festival Mengoni represented Italy in the Eurovision Song Contest 2013 with the song "L'essenziale". He finished in 7th place. In 2023, he won the Sanremo Music Festival again and represented Italy at Eurovision with "Due vite", finishing 4th. == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Italian singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Sanremo Music Festival winners
title: Marco Mengoni
